1.2.name: wordpress/visual-layouts
1.2.description:
Bring your website to life - with stunning animation and visual effects thanks to Freetile.

You'll have a sticky note style visual layout and can choose to list all your posts or selected posts. You can even use custom post types.

Just create a page or post and add the shortcode [dbc_freetile]

No coding and no theme to modify This is not a theme and you don't need to know anything about HTML or CSS or coding. Just activate the plugin and create a new page (or post) this will save you hours of research on the Internet.

What about a Demo?

Checkout Visual Layouts Demo

Checkout my other work

  • Damien - strategy, technical development
